definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.chinese: 不要把星巴克咖啡带进来。

sentences.english: At the brand new Starbucks store a long queue of people spilled onto the street.
sentences.chinese: 人们把崭新的星巴克大门围得水泄不通。

sentences.english: Some neighborhoods have a Starbucks on every block or two.
sentences.chinese: 一些相邻的地方，每一两个街区就有一家星巴克。
星巴克以走低端路线回应。

sentences.english: But it tends to be much more like, you know, working at Starbucks or working at, maybe McDonalds.
sentences.chinese: 但是更多的还是这种，在星巴克或者麦当劳工作。

sentences.english: Starbucks rolled out its instant coffee nationally a year ago.
sentences.chinese: 在一年前星巴克开始在美国市场出售速溶咖啡。

sentences.english: Starbucks sells more than 150,000 pounds of coffee every day.
sentences.chinese: 星巴克每天卖出的咖啡超过十五万磅。

sentences.english: Schultz has been both poor and good leader at Starbucks.
sentences.chinese: 舒沃茨在星巴克是即穷又好的领导人。

sentences.english: Keep in mind that a Venti Starbucks is like having about three cups of home brewed .
sentences.chinese: 大杯的星巴克咖啡等于三杯家中所泡咖啡之量。

sentences.english: Examples of early movers into the experience economy include Starbucks coffee shops.
sentences.chinese: 早期的体验经济时代进入这包括星巴克咖啡。

sentences.english: She pointed out that Starbucks offers health benefits even to its parttime employees.
sentences.chinese: 她对我说星巴克对兼职雇员也提供健康福利。

sentences.english: The meeting took place at a Starbucks in Westwood at two on a Tuesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一个星期二下午两点，在西敏市星巴克见的面。

sentences.english: MARK WARMUTH: "They're seeking something that would be better than what they can buy at Starbucks."
sentences.chinese: 他们追求一些比能在星巴克买到的口味更好的咖啡。

sentences.english: First, there was the "he buys his own coffee at Starbucks" thing.
sentences.chinese: 首先，引发攻击的是”他自己在星巴克买咖啡”一事。

sentences.english: You can get it at Starbucks or Coffee Beanery.
sentences.chinese: 去星巴克或者宾诺咖啡吧。

sentences.english: Starbucks Corp. is at it again.
